entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening and 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
